oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A postwar essay on the Lost Cause by a Confederate veteran
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A handwritten essay on the subject, "Those who died in a lost cause," by Daniel Hoge Bruce. The essay was submitted to E. E. Biddle at the T. C. Seminary. During the Civil War, Bruce served as a captain in Co. A, 51st Va. Inf., Regt., CSA. See tsla108 for Bruce's diary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
